history.content:
Hello Everyone,

Student Tech Services is kicking off our annual hiring cycle for student positions in our department. We would greatly appreciate it you would be willing to share our job opportunities with your students.

We are recruiting for nearly 20  different job titles in both technical and non-technical roles ranging from outreach and engagement to front line support to software development. Technical experience is not required for many of our positions and we offer competitive pay, flexible schedules, and on the job training for students interested in gaining more experience. Work-study is welcomed, but not required.

Jobs are open at studenttech.berkeley.edu/student-jobs through Friday, February 9th.

Monday, February 5th from 5-7pm we will be hosting a Student IT Job Fair at the Career Center to give applicants the chance to meet current student employees and get help with their resume. The event will include a prize drawing and snacks.

If possible, please share the below announcement and attached materials with your students.

And, of course, if you have any students with technical support needs, please have them get in touch with us, we're here to help!

Best,

 

Hayley

 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Student Tech Services is now hiring! Jobs for the summer and 2018/19 school year are now open at studenttech.berkeley.edu/student-jobs

  • A variety of positions with competitive pay! ($15-22.75/hr)

  • Flexible schedules in a student friendly office

  • On the job training, no experience required for many of our positions

Join us for our Student IT Job Fair on Monday, February 5th for a chance to talk with our current staff and get help with your resume! http://bit.ly/IT_Job_Fair

Apply by 5pm, Friday February 9th!

Student Tech Services Promo Video
history.subject: Announcement: Student Tech Services is hiring
